Format.name: Format
Format.description: Returns a class formatted according to instructions contained in a format expression

params.name: format
params.description: A valid named or user-defined format expression.

GetSheets.name: GetSheets
GetSheets.description: Returns a Sheets collection that represents all the sheets in the active workbook.

GetActiveSheet.name: GetActiveSheet
GetActiveSheet.description: Get the object that represents the active sheet.

GetSheet.name: GetSheet
GetSheet.description: Returns an object that represents the sheet

GetThemesColors.name: GetThemesColors
GetThemesColors.description: Get the list of all available theme colors for the spreadsheet.

SetThemeColors.name: SetThemeColors
SetThemeColors.description: Set the theme colors to the current spreadsheet.

params.name: theme
params.description: The list of theme colors that will be used to select the color scheme to be set to the current spreadsheet.

CreateColorFromRGB.name: CreateColorFromRGB
CreateColorFromRGB.description: Create an RGB color setting the appropriate values for the red, green and blue color components.

CreateColorByName.name: CreateColorByName
CreateColorByName.description: Create a color selecting it from one of the available color presets.

params.name: presetColor
params.description: A preset selected from the list of the available color preset names.

Intersect.name: Intersect
Intersect.description: Returns a ApiRange object that represents the rectangular intersection of two or more ranges. If one or more ranges from a different worksheet are specified, an error will be returned.

params.name: Range1
params.description: The intersecting ranges. At least two Range objects must be specified.

params.name: Range2
params.description: The intersecting ranges. At least two Range objects must be specified.

GetSelection.name: GetSelection
GetSelection.description: Returns an object that represents the selection range

AddDefName.name: AddDefName
AddDefName.description: Defines a new name for a range of cells.

Save.name: Save
Save.description: Saves changes to the specified document.
